content.question: Created by the peoples of the Torres Strait, the Buk mask shown uses turtle shell panels to create

choices.label: figurative elements of the human face and bird
textural components that suggest hair and feathers
small, contrasting details such as the figureâ€™s eyes
rustling sounds which were heard in performance

content.answer: figurative elements of the human face and bird

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
